mapper.select: select payment_no from payment where course_no =#{course_no} and student_no=#{student_no}

SELECT c.course_name,p.payment_price, e.employee_name, p.payment_name, p.payment_date, p.payment_phone FROM payment p JOIN course c ON p.course_no = c.course_no JOIN student s ON p.student_no = s.student_no JOIN employee e ON e.employee_no = c.employee_no where p.payment_no=#{payment_no}

SELECT p.payment_no,c.course_name,p.payment_price,to_char(c.course_start_date,'yyyy-mm-dd')course_start_date, e.employee_name, p.payment_name,to_char( p.payment_date,'yyyy-mm-dd')payment_date , p.payment_phone FROM payment p JOIN course c ON p.course_no = c.course_no JOIN student s ON p.student_no = s.student_no JOIN employee e ON e.employee_no = c.employee_no where p.student_no=#{student_no}

SELECT p.payment_no,c.course_name,p.payment_price, to_char(c.course_start_date,'yyyy-mm-dd')course_start_date, e.employee_name,p.payment_method, p.payment_name,to_char(p.payment_date,'yyyy-mm-dd')payment_date ,p.payment_phone FROM payment p JOIN course c ON p.course_no = c.course_no JOIN student s ON p.student_no = s.student_no JOIN employee e ON e.employee_no = c.employee_no where p.payment_no=#{payment_no}
